name: Slavic Feast of Commemoration
description:
Co-winner of 2016 Theater Game Jam in Poznan, local co-op game made by two programmers fellas - @kacpidev and @pandeiros

In the game players (up to 4) reinact roles during slavic feast of commemoration (also known as "Dziady"). By summoning and satisfying the needs of lost souls, players get rewarded by completing soul's wishes in given time. If they fail to do so, they shall be punished.
